text: The (Lunar) Eclipse (Persian: Khosoof) is a 1992 film by the Iranian director Rasool Mollagholipoor. Mollagholipoor also scripted the film which starred Hamid Abdolmaleki, Fariborz Arabnia and Mahmoud Basiri.IMDb ==References== category:Iranian films Category:1992 films Category:Persian-language films
title: The Eclipse (Iranian film)
